short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a new joke every day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a new joke every day with the Joke of the Day extension for Chrome! Never go a day without a laugh as we deliver daily jokes right to your browser. Our jokes are hand-picked from the best sources on the internet, so you're guaranteed to get a good chuckle. With a simple and intuitive user interface, the Joke of the Day extension is easy to use and great for all ages. Install it today and start your day with a smile!
